item.title: service.yaml
item.description: What is a service.yaml? A service.yaml can be thought as the specification for an application based on the modules being used. It defines the modules an application uses and the arguments to pass to them. What are the fields in a service.yaml name: The name of the application arguments: The arguments to pass to the modules. This is a map of key value pairs. modules: The modules to use.
